description: This Java class defines a data transfer object (DTO) for handling requests to make a move in an online chess game. It contains fields for the starting square, ending square, optional promotion piece, and player identification, along with corresponding getters and setters.

classes.name: MakeMoveRequest
classes.description: A data transfer object representing the details needed to make a move in the chess game, including source and destination squares, optional promotion, and player ID.

methods.name: getFrom
methods.description: Returns the source square of the move.

methods.name: getTo
methods.description: Returns the destination square of the move.

methods.name: getPromotion
methods.description: Returns the promotion piece type if any.

methods.name: getPlayerId
methods.description: Returns the identifier of the player making the move.

methods.name: setFrom
methods.description: Sets the source square of the move.

methods.name: setTo
methods.description: Sets the destination square of the move.

methods.name: setPlayerId
methods.description: Sets the identifier of the player.
